verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
(Nikurudishie nini,
Bwana kikupendeze). x2
Kila ninachokitoa
naona bado kidogo.
(Nikurudishie nini,
Bwana kikupendeze). x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Nashika mfuko wangu,
nakuta nina kidogo,
naomba unipokee

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ninakutolea Baba,
zawadi tu hii ya fedha,
naomba unipokee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Nakutolea nafaka,
kazi ya mikono yangu,
naomba unipokee.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ni mangapi nayafanya,
wewe wanihurumia,
ee Baba najiuliza.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Umenilinda mzima,
kwa wiki iliyopita,
natoa shukrani zangu.
